SELECT * FROM v_findmchn

AND proc_cd_code LIKE '%'||#{procCdCode}||'%'

SELECT * FROM bf_prod_process WHERE inst_prod_no = #{instProdNo} AND NOT process_order=5 order by 2,3

SELECT mchn.mchn_name, mchn.mchn_stts, mchn.mchn_code FROM BF_EQP_MCHN mchn, BF_CMN_LINE_CODE linecode, BF_CMN_LINE_CODE_HD linehd, BF_CMN_BOM_CODE bomcode WHERE mchn.mchn_code = linecode.mchn_code AND linecode.line_cd_hd_code = linehd.line_cd_hd_code AND linehd.line_cd_hd_code = bomcode.line_cd_hd_code AND fin_prd_cd_code = #{finPrdCdCode} AND NOT linecode.line_cd_ord = 5 AND NOT bomcode.bom_cd_use = 0 order by linecode.line_cd_ord
mapper.update:
UPDATE BF_PROD_PROCESS SET completion_status = 'y'
WHERE process_no = #{processNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE ( PROCESS_PERFOM_NO, PROCESS_NO, PROD_VOL, FLTY_VOL, WORK_START_TIME, WORK_END_TIME, WORKER_NAME, prod_date ) VALUES ( BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE_SEQ.nextval, #{processNo}, #{prodVol}, #{fltyVol}, #{workStartTime}, #{workEndTime}, #{workerName}, #{prodDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT rsccode.rsc_cd_code AS rscCdCode, rsccode.rsc_cd_name AS rscCdName, bomrsc.bom_rsc_use_vol AS bomRscUseVol, stock.rsc_lot_no AS rscLotNo, stock.rsc_stock AS rscStock FROM BF_CMN_RSC_CODE rsccode JOIN BF_CMN_BOM_RSC bomrsc ON rsccode.rsc_cd_code = bomrsc.rsc_cd_code JOIN BF_RSC_STOCK stock ON stock.rsc_cd_code = rsccode.rsc_cd_code JOIN BF_CMN_BOM_CODE bomcode ON bomcode.bom_cd_code = bomrsc.bom_cd_code WHERE bomcode.fin_prd_cd_code = #{finprdCdCode} ORDER BY rscCdCode
mapper.update: UPDATE BF_PROD_PROCESS SET vir_result = #{totalProdVol}, total_prod_vol = 0 WHERE process_no = #{processNo}
UPDATE BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE SET prod_vol = #{prodVol}, flty_vol = #{fltyVol}, work_end_time = #{workEndTime} WHERE process_no = #{processNo}
